name: Armies Of Alamar, The Game
blurb: Free to play 3D castle building MMORTS bringing to life medieval dreams. Build alliances and Conquer kingdoms in this fast paced game.

rewards.reward: Our heart felt THANKS for helping us build a dream and a mention in the credit scene.
1 Month Premium Membership and\r\n750 AoA Points.
2 Month Premium Membership and\r\n1500 AoA Points.

LIMITED QUANTITY!! 3 Month Premium Membership and 3000 AoA Points. Also at this level you will receive Access to our Beta Testing Guild to see firsthand what\u2019s going on. PLUS...  enough Fame and Gold to allow you to Rank quickly to mid-levels. This package is a $77.50 value!

2 Months Premium Membership, 2000 AoA Points and access to our Beta Testing Guild. PLUS\u2026 enough Fame and Gold to allow you to Rank quickly to mid-levels and choose 1 of 4 different Research Packages.

LIMITED QUANTITY!!! 2 Months Premium Membership, 2000 AoA Points and access to our Beta Testing Guild. PLUS... A Limited Edition AoA Poster, choose 1 of 4 different Research Packages and enough Fame and Gold to allow you to rank quickly to mid-levels. This package is a $90.00 value!

3 Month Premium Membership, 2000 AoA Points and access to our Beta Testing Guild. The Limited Edition AoA Poster. Choose 2 of 4 different Research Packages and enough Fame and Gold to allow you to rank quickly to mid-levels.  This package is a $107.00 value!

LIMITED QUANTITY!!! T-SHIRT EXTRAVAGANZA! Receive 3 Months Premium Membership and 3,000 AoA Points. Access to our Beta Testing Guild. 2 of 4 different Research Packages and enough Fame and Gold to Rank to mid-levels quickly. A large poster. PLUS\u2026 receive a special Architect Village Icon that will set you aside from the rest and A Limited Edition AoA T-Shirt! This package is a $168.00 value!

4 Months Premium Membership and 3,000 AoA Points. Access to our Beta Testing Guild along with 2 of 4 Research Packages. Enough Fame and Gold to Rank to mid-levels quickly, the Architect Village Icon and the large AoA poster. PLUS... A Limited Edition AoA T-Shirt and Architect Badge for the AoA website.

LIMITED QUANTITY!!! 4 Months Premium Membership and 3,000 AoA Points. Access to our Beta Testing Guild and 3 of 4 Research Packages. Enough Fame and Gold to Rank to mid-levels quickly, the website Architect Badge and Village Icon. The Limited Edition AoA T-shirt. PLUS... DESIGN A SECTION OF THE IN GAME SHIELD AND AN AUTOGRAPHED POSTER BY THE OWNERS!  Design one of the four different categories in our shield building process in your own unique style. (Implementing designs in game will proceed in order the pledges were received.) A $310.00 value!

LIMITED QUANTITY!!! 4 Months Premium Membership and 4,000 AoA Points. Access to our Beta Testing Guild and pick 3 of 4 Research Packages. Enough Fame and Gold to Rank to mid-levels quickly, the website Architect Badge and Village Icon. The Limited Edition AoA T-Shirt, the autographed large poster and design a section of the in game shield. PLUS\u2026 NAME A CAPITAL CITY. With this Very Limited Backer Level you will have the ability to name a capital city in one of our 3 opening servers. Name it whatever your heart desires (well within reason of course).

LIMITED QUANTITY!!! 6 Months Premium Membership, 10,000 AoA Points. Access to our Beta Testing Guild and all 4 Research Packages Enough Fame and Gold to Rank to mid-levels quickly, the website Architect Badge and in game Architect Village Icon. The Limited Edition AoA T-Shirt the autographed poster and design art for the shield along with naming a capital city. \r\nPLUS... BECOME AN IN GAME AVATAR. Send in your picture and the style you would want to be. We will place your face on your very own avatar. How cool would it be to have players walk around their villages and see you! (They will be made in the order the pledges were received.)

EXTREMELY LIMITED QUANTITY!!! Receive everything from the $500 dollar level. PLUS\u2026 DESIGN AN ORIGINAL RACE. At general release we will be bringing in races, or sooner if the Kickstarter goals are met. These Races will allow certain attributes to game play. Make one of these races your own! Take part in the creative process and the village building designs unique to your race. (Races must be reasonable and well balanced. The races will be in the general release of the game, sometime around March 2014 after beta has ended.)

EXTREMLY LIMITED QUANTITY!!! Receive everything from the $500 dollar level. PLUS\u2026 A CUSTOM SHIELD. These handcrafted works of art will be made by the owner of X and Z Productions LLC himself, and will be limited to only 8. Having over 20 years of experience in the art of weapon making this will not be some knock off replica! This will be a hand forged fully functional work of art. They will be made in the order the pledges were received and the owner will call and consult with you concerning the design.
